mapper.select: select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Employees_Number as employeesNumber from Enterprise_Management_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC

select * from (select Year_And_Month as yearAndMonth, Employees_AVG_Monthly_Number as employeesAVGMonthlyNumber from Enterprise_Management_Monthly_Data where Year_And_Month between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by yearAndMonth ASC
